title: Starter Island
paragraph: The most common island type where everyone lands with his airship. There is a pleasant climate on the island. But appearances are deceptive, because under the peaceful facade are hidden suspicions, intrigues and an approaching danger.

dynamicContents.content: The Starter Region is the home of the naki tribe and moderate spirits. {{ Druid Nakis # article/units/druid-naki }} and {{ Guard Nakis # article/units/guard-naki }} living next to {{Forest Spirits # article/units/forest-spirit }} and {{ Grass Spirits # article/units/grass-spirit }}.

The amount of airships a starter island has, depends on the world type. There can be up to four airships on the outer fields. In the middle is a portal, the only connection to other islands. 
 Around the portal there are four lesser treasure fields which each grants a treasure every 4 hours if a player obtains it.
